about_the_game:
Synthesis: Welcome to Hivefall, a post-apocalyptic world devastated by The Hive, a horde of carnivorous mutants that hunt in synchronicity. As one of the last survivors, your mission is simple: stay alive. Drive your caravan, fight for resources and decide whether you will rebuild what is left of humanity or perish in the attempt.

Every decision counts in this fight for survival and hope for a better future.

Main mechanics:

  • Dynamic Survival: Explore a hostile world by collecting resources, hunting prey and facing mutants. Constant movement is your best ally,

as stopping too long could attract the deadly attention of The Hive.

  • Your Caravan, Your Strength: Your vehicle is not just a means of transportation; It is your home, your refuge and your best weapon. Customize it and improve its capabilities to resist enemy attacks and travel long distances.

  • Wave Battles: Stay in one place too long and prepare to face endless hordes of enemies. With your caravan as a mobile combat base, use strategic tactics and resources to survive these brutal confrontations.

  • Reconstruction and Renaissance: Shows that humanity still has a chance.

If you survive long enough, you can help the villagers build self-sufficient settlements, marking the beginning of the recovery of the lost world.

short_description: In Hivefall, a world dominated by carnivorous mutants, fight to survive, prosper, and rebuild society. Drive your caravan, collect resources and face waves of enemies as you help humanity be reborn in this intense post-apocalyptic survival game. Will you survive?
